name: Kara
info:
• 简体中文名: 卡菈
  • 别名: カーラ
  • 性别: 女
  • 身高: 1.63 m
detail:
Kara is a AX400 android and one of the protagonists in Detroit: Become Human. She is a common housemaid android serving in the home of her owner Todd Williams and caring for his daughter Alice.
Kara's connection to her young charge may trigger an upheaval that breaks Kara from her repetitive existence and starts her on a journey out into the world.
